summary: We are looking for an Operations Manager to oversee logistics, supply chain, and process improvement for our regional operations.
responsibilities: Manage daily logistics and warehouse operations.
Implement process improvements to increase efficiency.
Coordinate with vendors and internal teams.
Monitor KPIs and prepare operational reports.
requirements_must_have: 5+ years of experience in operations or logistics.
Experience with ERP and supply chain systems.
requirements_nice_to_have: Experience in the Middle East region.
